attributes.action: Fair laws on Halal Meat in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
As a British-Sikh we are unable to eat Halal meat as it's against the Sikh faith.

Reason: Sikh code of conduct is do not eat flesh of an animal cooked in ritualistic manner.

The reasons for signing this petition is not like the EDL and to ban anything but for the reason are children who also school in the UK are not able to eat school meals as we, their parents are worried about our faith, belief, and Religion.

We would like the Government to change what meat is served and make it fair for all religions not to discriminate.
